zh-CN.subtitle: DK-Plus 是一套基于 Vue3.0 的 UI 组件库，主要用于快速开发 PC 端中后台产品,全面的组件和便捷的工具会让您信手拈来，如鱼得水。

en-US.subtitle: DK-Plus is a Vue3.0 UI component library, built on top of Vue 3.0. It is a full-featured UI component and is a great tool for developers to quickly develop PC-backed products.Comprehensive components and convenient tools will make you feel at home and as comfortable as a fish in water.
